name: Projekt Dune
description:
This is our entry for GGJ 2021. 

Try to find crew members on the deserted sandy planet. 

WASD to navigate, Mouse to look around. Mouse 1 to plant or collect the light beacons (you will need those)

We may or may not continue the project. 

Ok, this a  jam build so Alt+F4 to quit the game :)

Thank you for playing.
